comment: Tastes just like I like my women. Hot and simple. Joking! (in case my wife reads this). Well after 50% bourbans this tasted higher strength. Not rough, nice simple vanilla and hint of sherry. 3.25

Nose- moonshine, fig, raisin, caramel apple

Taste- spicy, cinnamon, raisin 

Finish- peppery, fig
